Hold CTRL in game screen to draw bigger areas.

TILE_5.description: The player can jump through it, but will land on it when he falls

TILE_edge.name: edge
TILE_edge.description: Will display on the edge of the game screen

PLAYER_IDLE_SPRITE.name: playerIdle
PLAYER_IDLE_SPRITE.description: The player sprite that is shown when you are not moving.

PLAYER_JUMP_SPRITE.name: playerJump
PLAYER_JUMP_SPRITE.description:
The player sprite that is shown when you are jumping.
Jump SFX will be displayed underneath.

PLAYER_WALL_JUMP_SPRITE.description: The player sprite that is shown when you are jumping.

PLAYER_WALK_SPRITE.name: playerWalk
PLAYER_WALK_SPRITE.description: The player sprite that is shown when you are running.

START_FLAG_SPRITE.name: startFlag
START_FLAG_SPRITE.description:
The starting point of a level. You also respawn here, if you die.
If you create multiple start-flags, for non-linear games, you can click on a set start flag again, to declare it as the default start of a level.

CHECKPOINT_FLAG.name: checkpoint
CHECKPOINT_FLAG.description: If the player touches the checkpoint, he will respawn here after a death. If there are multiple checkpoints, the latest one the player touched will become the respawn point.

FINISH_FLAG_SPRITE.name: finishFlag
FINISH_FLAG_SPRITE.description:
The goal of a level. If you touch it, by default you continue to the next level. If you want to specify a custom exit to a different level, click on a set finish flag again.
Closed finish flag sprite

FINISH_FLAG_CLOSED_SPRITE.name: finishFlagClosed
FINISH_FLAG_CLOSED_SPRITE.description: This sprite will be displayed if the player needs to collect collectibles to access the Finish flag (Can be configured by clicking on a set finish flag in the game screen).

SPIKE_SPRITE.name: spike
SPIKE_SPRITE.description: A spike. If you touch it, you die

TRAMPOLINE_SRPITE.name: trampoline
TRAMPOLINE_SRPITE.description: A trampoline. You will jump approximately twice as high when you land on it.

CANON_SPRITE.name: canon
CANON_SPRITE.description: A cannon. It shoots cannonballs at certain time intervals. Click on it after placing it again, to change the attributes of the individual cannon.

STOMPER.name: stomper
STOMPER.description: A deadly hazard, that will fly torwards the player, if he is in it's way and move back to it's initial place once it hits a solid block. Can be rotated by clicking on a placed object again.

TOGGLE_MINE.name: toggleMine
TOGGLE_MINE.description: An object that is harmless at first, but once you step in and out of it, it becomes deadly.

DISAPPEARING_BLOCK_SPRITE.name: disappearingBlock
DISAPPEARING_BLOCK_SPRITE.description: A block that will disappear upon touching it. It will reappear after a certain time.

WATER.name: water
WATER.description: A passable block that slows down gravity and let's you jump infinitely inside it. Every object can be placed on it.

RED_BLOCK.name: redBlock
RED_BLOCK.description: There are red blocks and blue blocks. Only one them can be active at a time. By touching the switch (in the objects tab), the active tiles can be switched.

BLUE_BLOCK.name: blueBlock
BLUE_BLOCK.description: There are red blocks and blue blocks. Only one them can be active at a time. By touching the switch (in the objects tab), the active tiles can be switched.

RED_BLUE_BLOCK_SWITCH.name: redblueblockswitch
RED_BLUE_BLOCK_SWITCH.description: A switch for red/blue tiles. Can be activated by hitting it with your head, or if a stomper/cannon-ball/rocket hits it.

TREADMILL.name: treadmill
TREADMILL.description: It will move the player in a certain direction when he stands on it. Click on a set treadmill again to change it's direction. (Or press shift before placing it)

ICE_BLOCK.name: iceBlock
ICE_BLOCK.description: It's slippery. The player can't stick to it if walljump is active.

ROCKET_LAUNCHER.name: rocketLauncher

changeableAttributes.name: rotationSpeed
changeableAttributes.descriptiveName: rotation speed

ROCKET_LAUNCHER.description: A rocket-launcher. It shoots rockets at certain time intervals that will follow the player. Click on it after placing it again, to change the attributes of the individual cannon.

NPC_SPRITE.name: npc
NPC_SPRITE.description: An object that can display a dialogue. Click on it again after placing it, to display the dialogue window.

CANON_BALL_SPRITE.name: canonBall
CANON_BALL_SPRITE.description:
A cannonball. The cannon shoots it.
When it hits a wall, explosion will be displayed.

ROCKET.name: rocket
ROCKET.description:
A rocket. The rocket launcher shoots it.
When it hits a wall, explosion will be displayed.

PORTAL.name: portal
PORTAL.description:
Second Sprite: Here

A portal with 2 exits.
Just draw 2 portals on the game screen. The odd one will automatically be the first, the even one the second.

PORTAL2.name: portal2
PORTAL2.description:
First Sprite: Here

A portal with 2 exits.
Just draw 2 portals on the game screen. The odd one will automatically be the first, the even one the second.

COLLECTIBLE.name: collectible
COLLECTIBLE.description:
They can be placed to give the player an additional challenge.
Inside the tool, the collectibles will reappear if you die or reset the level, in the exported game they are gone forever, once collected.

LASER_CANON.name: laserCanon
LASER_CANON.description: A laser cannon. It shoots lasers until they hit a wall. Click on it after placing it again, to change the attributes of the individual laser cannon.

LASER.name: laser
LASER.description: A laser. The laser cannon shoots it.

BARREL_CANNON.name: barrelCannon
BARREL_CANNON.description: A barrel. When the player touches it, he gets inside of it and stays there, until he presses the jump button - then he will be launched out of it in it's direction.

JUMP_RESET.name: jumpReset
JUMP_RESET.description: It resets your jump in air. It is deactivated upon touching the ground or wall.

FIXED_SPEED_RIGHT.name: fixedSpeedRight
FIXED_SPEED_RIGHT.description:
Activates auto-run mode upon touching.
The auto-run can be stopped by the auto-run stopper tile.
Jumping off a wall will change the run direction. Click on a set object again, to change it's default direction.

FIXED_SPEED_STOPPER.name: fixedSpeedStopper
FIXED_SPEED_STOPPER.description: This tile stops the auto-run activated by the auto-run sprite.

PATH_SPRITE.name: pathPoint

changeableAttributes.name: stopFrames
changeableAttributes.descriptiveName: wait

PATH_SPRITE.description:
Draw paths, put objects on top and the objects will follow them. Click on an already set path-point, while paths are selected in build-tools to adjust the path's attributes.
Compatible objects
  • Finish flag
  • Spikes
  • Trampolines
  • Toggle mine
  • Rocket launchers
  • Portals
  • Collectibles
  • Barrel cannons
  • Jump reset
Rules
  • Draw paths in a line or in an enclosed 'circle'
  • Place as many different objects on them as you want
  • You can't draw 2 paths above or beside each other. You need to leave 1 free space inbetween

SFX1.name: sfx
SFX1.description: SFX that shows when the player jumps.

SFX2.name: sfx
SFX2.description: SFX when cannon ball or rocket hit a wall.

SFX4.name: sfx
SFX4.description: SFX when an object is placed in build mode

SFX5.name: sfx
SFX5.description: Plays when the player touches a collectible.

SFX9.name: sfx
SFX9.description: Will be displayed behind the player, if the player is in auto-run mode.
